Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Cicero, Harrison, Kostner and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Kilpatrick.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Cicero, Harrison, Kostner and Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Kilpatrick.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
